oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cloth-bound, harbdboard covers, several pages torn.
Frontispiece: portrait of Aga Khan III in official regalia.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.

With: Das:avatār:pīr:sadardhīnjo [Das Avatār niñḍho] / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Ladhāī Shāh ; Prem:pāṭaṇ:vaḍo / Pīr Shams, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh, ... [et al.] ; Das:avatār:niñḍho / Pīr Shams ; Kalmûñ / Pīr Satgûr Nûr, Pīr Shams, Pīr Indra Imām ad-Dīn ; [Ginān]11:gûgrījo / Pīr Imām Shāh ; [Ginān]121:gûgrījo / Pīr Imām Shāh ; [Ginān]13:gûgrījo / Pīr Imām Shāh.
